reviews.review_msg: Dr. Kennedy is by far the best professor I have taken at SFU. He is a very hilarious prof that makes the lectures amazing. He teaches the course material and makes sure that everyone understands the topic. The down side is that he has a very bad hand writing so make sure that you attend the lectures. Exams were straight from the notes.
Chris is a great instructor, very informative notes and excellent use of arrows. Not only is he effective in the classroom, he looks good doing it.
